LanguageData.SettingLabel: Select the groups of pawns, which should be supervised. If any of this pawns get a mood debuff from there ideo by cutting trees, all pawns won't automatically cut trees in growing zones and by building structures and roofing
LanguageData.SettingIdeoIsColonistDesc: Do not cut trees if any colonist get a mood debuff from cutting trees
LanguageData.SettingIdeoIsSlaveDesc: Do not cut trees if any slave get a mood debuff from cutting trees
LanguageData.SettingIdeoIsGuestDesc: Colonist, which joins your colony temporary by a quest
LanguageData.SettingIdeoIsPrisonerDesc: Do not cut trees if any prisoner get a mood debuff from cutting trees
LanguageData.SettingManualPawnListDesc: This setting adds a GIZMO button to every pawn with a ideo with a mood debuff by cutting trees. This setting only expands the other settings. For complete manual control deactivate the above settings.(IsColonist, IsSlave, IsGuest and IsPrisoner)
LanguageData.SettingGeneral: Always deactivate automatically tree cutting for all pawns
LanguageData.SettingGeneralDesc: When this setting is activated all colonist won't automatically cut trees in growing zones, building structures and roofing (no matter their ideo)
LanguageData.ShowQuickSettingButtonDesc: Adds a button in the right bottom corner. The button opens a float menu to quickly change the settings
LanguageData.ManualPawnListGizmoDesc: This setting only expands the other settings. For complete manual control deactivate the other settings.(IsColonist, IsSlave, IsGuest, IsPrisoner)
